attributes.action: scrap the child support agency or bring in changes earlyer to help struggling fathers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i myself pay 70 pound per week to the c.s.a and have in the past payed allot more than this up to 140 pound a week for 1 child i live with my parent and dont get any allowence for this i also on a flat week pick up 140 pound from my job after the c.s.a take the money out i have been in finacial difficults for 8 years now because the c.s.a decide i should pay so much im on the old system of the c.s.a and wont be changed over untill 2011 to 2013 by which time my son will be 15 i see my son and he stays over 1 night a week he used to stay over two nights a week but his mother decided her c.s.a would go down so stopped this the c.s.a is resposable for this as it pushes the parent with care in the direction to get more money allot of fathers have commited suicide all because the c.s.a dont leave them enough to live on kids grow up without fathers because of this its taking lives an make people live in poverty

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/THE-CSA/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
